My name is Aurélien Callens, I am passionate about data science, coding and fishing ! Professionally, I am a data scientist with a PhD in Applied Mathematics. My doctoral thesis focused on the development of solutions based on machine and deep learning algorithms to solve problems related to coastal risks.
